I ordered the size 6, and I typically can wear a size 4 - 6. The colour of this two piece is a lovely dark blue, although it doesn't appear as dark as the photos. The fit is athletic, and the back straps provide great support without pinching. Despite this, the top may not do if you have a full bust. The swim bottom provides full coverage but seems somewhat small, fits tight, and hits at an odd place. Nonetheless, it doesn't feel as if you'll be exposed while you walk or bend over.  Note: there is a pleasant surprise, something not seen in the photo-- a greenish-teal and blue waist band-- very pretty! It would have been nice to have a little teal somewhere on the top, perhaps on the straps. Overall I like the two piece, it serves its lap, and fitness purpose and I'm keeping it. Although it'll probably need replacing due to fading from the chlorine after about 2 1/2 months of wear, once a week for 2.5 hours. I hope this review helps!

The color of this garment is true to photographed color. I ordered the teal and it's super soft and comfy. However, it is VERY see through which is why I gave it a 4 star. I still really like it though. It does run a bit small for a 1X/XL since I generally wear a size M/L and it fits me more like a bigger L would, not a 1X. So I recommend sizing up if you normally wear plus sizes. I love it as a tunic though with leggings though and think it is one of the most comfortable feeling fabrics I have felt in a while. The construction is great. Perfect seams and not a loose thread in sight. I did receive this product at a discounted rate for my unbiased review, but my opinions are 100% my own. I never guarantee a positive review, only one the product deserves!

So this product says it is 10k gold (not gold plated)...not so. Real gold does not turn green. When I wear my jewelry (have to purchase real gold), I wear it in the shower, sleeping, etc. because it is real gold and should not have a problem. I prefer to put it on and wear it instead of removing because it is fake and will turn. Well...I did the same with these ear rings and they have now started to turn green (not dirty from wearing). In between the different gold colors (the creases between them) are now green. Real gold does not turn green so that tells me that it is not 10k gold but gold plated. Had I had known that it was gold plated and not real gold, I never would have purchased them. How disappointing! I paid $55.00 for them and see they are now $39.99 so that might explain a price drop...10k 3 Color Yellow White Rose Gold Fancy Heart Drop Earrings

There are some flaws in the shirt:  the hem is not even in the front, the material is very thin, and it's definitely see through, even though I bought a dark color to try to avoid that.  But the unevenness is within acceptable limits for my taste, and I'm willing to wear a cami under it, so it works out.  It's a cute, casual shirt, that I don't expect to last long, because I doubt the material will hold up to very many washings.

reviewText: Cute. Roomy. Comfy lining.

It isn't easy to find cute and fashionable clothes when you are plus sized. That is one of the many reasons that I really like this awesome top. It is flattering regardless of your figure, but especially if you tend to carry weight around your belly. I had twins seven weeks ago, so I am finding that a lot of my tops look pretty awful right now. That is not the case with this top! The flared bottom comes off your body just enough that it isn't clingy. Yet it isn't so large that it looks like a maternity top. It is a great length, even on someone as tall as me. It adequately covers everything. The scoop neck is very stylish and allows you to show some skin without being over the top. It is a thin material but not so thin that it ends up being see through. The shirt washes well maintaining its vibrant color. It is also really soft. The only small down side to the top is that it does wrinkle. Not an issue for normal everyday wear, but it is probably a shirt you don't want to pack for vacation. I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion and review.

reviewText: The quality of this dress is great!  They also gave me a free gift with purchase (super cute tank top).  You will want to read the reviews before you purchase as they describe this dress accurately, many thanks to those who took pictures of themselves as they were spot on.  Here is my opinion:  This dress is made of a very nice high quality material and is VERY fitted, stretchy, and clinging everywhere.  You are able to stretch it out a bit where you need to, but make no mistake, this is not going to flow loosely over your curves. I am normally a size 2x (18-20), size B bust, fuller tummy, narrow hips. I was happy I ordered the 3X (thanks to past reviewers) because it was plenty snug and the 2X would have been too small for my comfort zone.  I am not planning to wear the dress solo as it is pretty revealing in the belly, but with a cardigan, tights and boots- ADORABLE!  I can  give this great dress a 5 as I knew what to expect when I ordered it, had I not read the reviews I would have been surprised at how fitted it was.
summary: Read the reviews so that you know what you are buying, lovely dress!

Bought this hoodie 1 size bigger for my wife so she could be comfy and warm at the race track we attend. After one wash the hoodie shrunk so bad that it will not even fit my 12 year old son. The material was cheap, and not what I expected from Alpinestar. We own a lot of motocross brands and this is by far the worst purchase ever made. The hoodie shrunk at least 3 times smaller then the size purchased. We followed the instructions on the tag for washing, as we do with everything we wash. This is also not are first rodeo with motocross brands. The waist line of the hoodie went from below her waist, up past her belly button. The arm cuffs went from being baggy around her wrist, then shrunk up to her forearm. This hoodie did the exact same thing that the cheap poorly made hoodie I bought at a gift shop did. Very Cheap, I am shocked that this happened. Never once has any Alpinestar clothing done this to me. I guess I will go back to purchasing these brands of cloths online at a real motocross site. I also wrote the company to have this issue resolved, and I am waiting to hear back from them.
summary: HOODIE SHRUNK SO BAD, IT CAN NOT BE WORN ANY MORE... 1 WASH

reviewText:
I received this item for free for a review.  All opinions are 100% my own.

Ive been a huge fan of DragonBall Z since I was a kid, and have been watching the new series online. I thought that this would definitely be nice to have to wear around the house or out to the gym (whenever I join one). I got an XL so its a little big on me, but not too much. Ive mostly been wearing it in the evening. The fabric itself is a little stiff, but its gotten better after washing it a few times. It doesnt appear to have shrunk up much, if at all, in the washwhich is nice. Its not super thick, but it is heavy cotton so I haven't really worn it outside too much due to the continuing heat wave weve been having.

Overall, its a very nice shirt & perfect for DBZ fans.

I loved this and got many inquiries on where I purchased it. I really loved this piece, I either lost it or i was stolen but I plan to purchase another. It's a fun way to jazz up an outfit or look. It got kind of uncomfortable after prolonged use. My nose would feel pinched so I would take it off for a while or switch it to the other side. Besides that, I don't have any complaints. I actually assumed it would fall apart because it was so cheap but to my surprise it held up for a year before I lost it. I'd recommend and I'd buy again.

I am really pleased with this shirt. I love the theme and design. As a long time fan of Dragonball I can really appreciate having one of these shirts. I am a big guy on the edge of 2XL and this shirt fit me well unlike some that for short or tight. The material is not real thin like some other shirts which end up tearing easily,  the logo on it also seems to be good quality. Overall I got to give this shirt a 5/5 rating.

I received this product at no cost to me in exchange for my honest unbiased review.

This shirt is well made. I hate buying clothes online. You never know if you are getting factory rejects. The quality of the seems and the alignment of the pattern is always something that worries me about shopping for clothes online. This T-Shirt was received with no quality issues. Each seem was nicely sewn. The logo is center. The paint looks is described. It was true to size and didn't shrink when it was washed. I'm very pleased with the quality of this T-Shirt.

reviewText:
I just got it today!
I'm a size medium, out of the box it feels slightly small, however it loosens up over time and fits well. I'm very pleased how light (4 oz) and breathable this hat is, compared to the western straw hats I had in the past. You can tell the weight differences. I noticed in the comments that there was some fabric underneath the brim. My hat didn't come with that and I thought it was worth mentionOverall, I like it!
summary: I'm very pleased how light (4 oz) and breathable this hat is

reviewText:
I like that this hat is mesh, and that on the front of the hat there is fabric under the brim to block out the sun on my face. It is very lightweight and airy. It is not adjustable, the material is stiff, but still quite comfortable. I deducted one star because the fabric on the underside of the brim looks like function over style and if I was short and nobody would be looking upward toward my face, I would keep this hat. However I am tall and so the underside of the brim would show and the color reminds me of support hose. I am reluctantly sending back this airy-lighweight hat.

In most of my reviews I talk about how a product smells - this hat does not have a chemical smell at all. That's unusual for straw hats and probably because it is not shipped from overseas and does not require spraying with insect killing spray to get it into the USA. So no doubt it is healthier to wear.

I received this at a discount for my honest unbiased review.

First off, this waist training corset is just as beautiful as it looks--lots of lacey mesh and beautifully done embroidery, great shape, and the boning-style is gorgeous (though there is no actual boning sewn in).  I am a plus sized girl with a X-shaped figure (small waist, equal shoulder and hip width), and the shape of this corset just worked for me.  My husband is a huge fan since it looks like lingerie, and I am a fan because I get a level of compression and shaping that cannot be seen under clothing (like any good shapewear should be!).

I ordered an XL, but I am a good bit over the weight limit for that size, according to the company (5'6", 220 lbs)--however, it still fit great and it doesn't seem to be tremendously stretched.  My body shape may have something to do with this (much of the weight I carry is distributed beyond what this corset covers), so I don't know how that knowledge will help others, but I would say that perhaps the weight limits in the sizing are a little more lenient than they are written.

I love that this corset features multiple rows of hook and eye closures--I am in process of losing weight and look forward to being able to adjust this trainer as I go along.  The straps are also adjustable and can be removed or switched around as necessary if being worn under clothing--a nice bonus.

My only complaint is that as I wear it and move around, it seems to gather in the back just under my ribcage where my waist is smallest, and it creates a really tight place there which gets uncomfortable rather quickly.  If I am in a shirt, I can easily remedy this by pulling the material down and back into place, but if I was in a dress or other longer one-piece outfit, I would imagine it would require a few trips to the bathroom over the course of a meal or event in order to return the trainer to a less-painful position.  To be noted, waist trainers are not necessarily supposed to be used in this way (as general shapewear), but this piece is advertised as such, so I thought it might be worth the mention for those who intend to use it as shapewear.

I received this corset at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest review, and I am fairly pleased with it, love the way it looks, and think it is a great addition to my "pretty underthings" repertoire.
summary: Beautiful piece of shapewear... great fit!

reviewText:
My husband is planning a month long trip and I am helping him organize his luggage for his trip. You don't think you are taking much, but especially for a month-long trip you really need to pre-plan. I happened upon The Yepal Unisex Adult LightWeight 3 Piece Packing Pouch Set on Amazon, ordered it, and it came very quickly.

I purchased them in both the Red and the Blue color. The red is definitely more of a burgundy, but not quite a pink. These three bags are made of a rip stop nylon, similar to a very lightweight backpack material. I like that they are light and not bulky because traveling for a month you don't need more weight in your bag. There is a heavy weight zipper which is nice so they can actually be used for a long time. There is also a nice heavy clip, I am not sure if that is something that my husband will need however the clips are nice to have.

The material is water resistant, but I wouldn't say that it is water proof. These will be great to travel with cosmetics and those types of things that may leak, the fabric feels like it will really keep the leaks from escaping the bags, but they are washable which is obviously perfect for traveling.

There are three pouches, with measuring 9.5 x 7.5 inches, 7.5 x 5.5 inches, and 5.5 x 3.75 inches. The different sizes will really help my husband keep everything organized during his travels, and also while he is staying at a hotel for a month.

I ordered the pink set and although I am not a big fan of pink, I thought it would work well for finding them quickly in my suitcase. Plus my husband will not be so apt to "steal" them from me LOL. Each bag comes with a clip attached to it. Not really sure what I would attach them to but it could be handy if you can think of something to use it for. The bags are well constructed and seem to be very durable. I have not tried the waterproof part but they are pretty thick so I think you will get at least some protection from moisture.  My fault for not reading the size description better. Overall very good bags and will be useful for me.

reviewText: Loved it. Kept my clothes wrinkle free
Works for packing

I was looking for things that would make traveling easier. This product looks like it will fit the bill.
I think a lot of my problem with traveling is how I pack.
This product shows how to fold items on a plastic board that fits nicely into a pocket. Once you follow the easy instructions, you simply stack and then close the Velcro lined sides. This ensures a snug fit that will help keep your clothes neat and tidy.
I tried a few items and they held up well. I think this will make it possible to bring clothes other than standard cotton knit. If I do not have to iron, I will definitely bring more "dressy" blouses. This is also great when my husband travels and needs to take his dress shirts.
So glad that I got this product and can't wait to travel again.

reviewText:
Some thoughts:

- Lightweight which is great so it doesnt add weight to your luggage.

- Completely washable and water resistant on the outer layer.

- Clear instructions. The bag comes with an instruction card for folding t-shirts and pants for maximize the wrinkle-free protection with the bag. The card also makes a good hard case for initial use.

- The clothes are fasten in with velcro straps. They do not feel like they will last but they are good enough for occasional use. These straps hold the clothes bag so you can fasten the outer flaps so your clothes won't move about when you hold the bag with its handle.

- The downside is that the bag is rather small. Depending on the thickness of the clothing you have, you can fit may be 8 pieces of shirts or pants in it. I managed to fit 12 thin summer dresses.

Overall, this is a versatile storage bag. Good for both travel and use at home. I occasionally submit reviews for products I enjoy so I got to buy this first one cheaper. If I rate this product 5 out of 5, I will purchase it again and will recommend the product to others. If I rate this product 4 out of 5, I will purchase it again in the case there is no alternative option. If I rate this product 3 out of 5, I won't purchase it again but I will keep using the current one I have. Anything below 2 out of 5 is sent back to the returns department if possible and I will not purchase anything from this company. I am a shopper who relies heavily on reviews and I work hard to provide my honest opinion of the product. This note is a mix of my objective views and personal thoughts on the product. I hope you it gives you a better sense of the product you are looking at.

What a convenient product! I travel a lot and after the first couple days of travel I have to repack my bag because my clothes are all over the place. The Kepal Wrinkle Shirt Organizer is perfect for keeping everything neat and wrinkle free. The product is very light weight and doesn't add extra weight to your suitcase. I use it for t-shirts but pants and other types of clothes work as well. I put five to six shirts in the organizer at a time, just depends on the style of shirt. It is great for dress shirts and collard shirts that you need to keep wrinkle free. I would recommend ordering 2-3 of them for each type of clothing (pants, shirts, etc). A great travel product!

I have received this product at a discount cost for my honest opinion.

I was excited to try this product as travel season is here and I'm always looking for ways to make the packing process easier and more efficient. I had never thought of a packing organizer before, but I'm so glad I came across it.

When you unfold the organizer, you'll see that It comes with a plastic chart showing how to fold the clothing, and that can be removed for washing the product. The clothing is folded and placed in the center of the open organizer. I was able to fit 8 short sleeved shirts easily and could probably go as high as 8 or 10, although the amount may vary if you're packing thicker items. The sides of the organizer are then folded around the clothing, making for a compact and easily packable package for the suitcase.

Pros include: *The item is washable which is plus, as a surprising number of organizers I looked into are not.
*It's very lightweight so it won't much affect the poundage, which is important when flying
*The size would work well to keep items compact, and would be perfect for using in a carry-on bag
*I like that it will keep items wrinkle free. This would come in handy when packing dress shirts for a business trip
*The idea in an of itself is wonderful; so many times I have packed for trips and items ended up all over the suitcase
*When not traveling this would work great as a closet organizer, storing off season items
*I personally did not find the item too small, it will fit the shirts I need for traveling, and I would purchase a second one for pants

Cons: The only slight improvement I could see being made is the organizer having a front and back stiff panel, as opposed to just the one in the back. When I pick the item up by the handle the clothing hangs toward the bottom a bit. But I really don't foresee the need to use the handle, as I will be picking the whole thing up when packing.

Overall, I am happy with the product and will continue to use it for future travels.
summary: Great way to keep travel organized!

reviewText: Two problems - the item is too small in terms of square inches of storage area (not cubic, just the basic footprint). reviewText: This is a review for "Choies Women's Black/Green/White/Blue Sakura Skater Skirt With Pleat". I was very doubtful about ordering this skirt after reading the reviews, anyhow I ordered it since I already own another skirt from choies. ( Choies Womens High Waist Midi Skater Skirt L,Black which fits great on me. ) The waistline on the "Choies Women's Black/Green/White/Blue Sakura Skater Skirt With Pleat" was very tight. The front and back was not at all proportionate. It made me feel very uncomfortable. The zipper was way too tight and was stuck. There were some loose threads in certain places. The print on the skirt was excellent and the material was good too. There is a thin inner lining for the skirt, so its not see through. The skirt came a little below my knee. After giving it some thought, I decided to return the skirt because I like to feel comfortable in what I wear too and just not look good in what I wear. Else this skirt would have ended up looking just pretty, unused and brand new in my closet. Four stars just for the look and feel of the skirt, deducted one star for the fit. What I learned from this purchase: One size never fits all.

I am loving this bag. It's durable, cute, and can hold a lot of stuff. I went with purple and I love the color. I generally use the shoulder strap instead of the handles. The shoulder strap has been able to handle quite a bit of weight without starting to separate from the bag. the handles are even sturdier.

There are a lot of pockets on this The main pouch also contains a zippered pocket as well as some smaller accessory pockets. There is a clip you can attach your keys or something else to so it doesn't get lost in the bag, although the clip itself isn't as sturdy or as large as I would like. The back of the bag has a pocket that uses velcro to close. The front has a large zippered pouch as well as some smaller pouches. Although at first glance it looks like just two small pouches on the front, there are actually three. There is a pouch with a velcro flap on the right. The small pouch on the right closes with a zipper, and on the front of that pouch is a smaller pouch that is a bit difficult to see at first because of how the top folds over it.

The bottom of the bag has a padded rectangle sewn into it to add some extra strength and durability to the bag. It's a nice feature, but I wish it was a bit larger. The main compartment is huge. I can keep my wallet, a changing pad with diapers, a book, an iPad Mini, my wallet, my keys, and a few snacks just in the main compartment and without forcing it all to fit. The bag can hold a lot more once you start filling up the smaller pockets too.

This also comes with a little soft elephant charm that is adorable. I love this whole bag and it is actually replacing my regular purse and my diaper bag on a fairly regular basis.

I received this item in exchange for my honest review.
summary: My new favorite bag and it can hold so much stuff

reviewText:
This is my new favorite bag!! It was worth the wait (ups lost it the first order and I had to get it replaced) The bag is a thick nylon and feels very sturdy. It would make a great diaper bag or purse or even book bag. It has so many different pockets you have a place for everything. It also comes with a cute elephant keychain. I wish the handle straps were a little longer but it's ok because the rest of the bag makes up for it. I ordered black but it is more of a blue purple. Still beautiful though.

* I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review*
summary: This is my new favorite bag!

reviewText:
Beautiful purse/tote/shoulder bag from Oiwas.

I ordered the purple one and I am absolutely in love with the quality and size of it. The color isn't pure purple, it's more of a mulberry red-violet. I can carry just about anything I'd ever need for a day or weekend trip out of the house - minus the clothes of course. I tested it out and can fit my tablet, phone, check book, books, wallet, herbal/mineral supplements, yarn for my knitting projects and even a netbook in it - plus still have room left over.

I took many photos to show the true sizes of the bag.
Width - 15.5 inches
Length top to bottom - 14 inches not including handles
smaller handles - 5 inch drop
larger handle for cross body or shoulder - 11 to 23 inch drop
Front pocket has a hidden pocket
zippered front pocket - 6 inches
velcro flap front pocket - 6 inches
Front zipper slot pocket - 11 inches
back velcro slot pocket - 12 inches x 11 inches
The interior is a beautiful softer grey, not dark stormy grey. It has 2 ink pen slot pockets, 2 larger slot pockets, and one zippered pocket on the opposite side. It also has a key-fob so you never lose your keys in the bottom of your bag.

The stitching is just wonderful. Very strong and secure. The zippers are heavy duty plastic with large teeth and strong zipper pull.

I can imagine this would be a perfect bag for teachers/instructors/nurses and also moms on the go. This could actually take the place of a purse and diaper bag and use it as an all-in-one. It's also a great bag for students and athletes who need to take numerous items with them on the go.

The added detail of an elephant keychain is cute!

I received this bag as a free sample to evaluate for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Beautiful purse/ tote/ shoulder bag from Oiwas.

reviewText: I am a HUGE fan of this company and own several of their bags. They are all high quality, fun and durable. This particular bag is roomy yet easy to organize with it's various pockets and compartments. The little elephant adds a whimsical flair to the purse (but can be taken off if you don't like it). The style and form reminds me very much of a Baggellini or Kipling bag, both of which are at least twice as much as this one. I will be using this bag as my daily purse to take to work. I love cross body bags as they leave my hand free to carry other things or to handle my phone. This bag is big enough to carry my iPad, phone, files, make up and other daily essentials without any trouble. The little key clip on the inside is perfect to hang my FOB from. I am absolutely thrilled that I received a free sample of this bag in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. It is a lot of fun to review items you absolutely love and do not hesitate at all recommending this purse! One of my new favorite purses!

Zoppen's Multi-purpose Travel Bag is really a beautiful product.
I've been using this for some time now and I'd like to go over my testing.

Design:
Talk about pockets! They are all over in this gorgeous bag!
I currently have no wallet/Clutch of this luxury. The hand strap makes it into a nice evening bag as well. The shape is elegant and still very simple. I adore the snap closure.

Manufacturing :
Throughly inspected all the sewing is even and all the color is exactly the same.
The zipper is intact and in working order. The name is embossed evenly, it is  really manufactured well.

Ease of use: This holds alot! Honestly I am able to put the majority of my cards in the slots, it holds change, cash, eye glasses,  lipstick, lotion, it is a perfect evening bag or I've been using it as a large wallet! I'm extremely impressed overall.

I'm in love with beautiful light green and it is so  multifaceted as far as uses.

Overall :
Design  5/5
Manufacturing 5/5
Ease of use 5/5.
I'm extremely impressed with Zoppen's Travel Bag. It is a classy item with so many uses. I highly recommend this to anyone who prefers a lighter bag, needs a great new clutch, or even with prom around the corner. This is your new favorite bag!

I did receive this item at a discount.  I have tested it and used it and the above information is strictly my nonbiased and honest review. I am not affiliated with this company or any others I choose to review.

This was the sleekest travel wallet I could find, and the agate green color is true to the image - a beautiful sage green. I needed this to be able to hold 4 passports and be easily accessible on a recent trip. It was quite the squeeze getting them all in there the first time but it has stretched out beautifully, and I have no issues trying to close it. After removing my large bundle of passports, it took to its normal shape just fine. I get compliments on this all the time, it was such a steal!
summary: and the agate green color is true to the image - a beautiful sage green

reviewText: Great Toddler PJs, 100% soft smooth cotton, tag-less, well made and durable! Really glad I found these online!  I am very happy with the Babyroom product in cotton pj's. I believe this is a product made and marketed in China.  I am not that up on where name brands get their product; however, this may be one of those that sells to different high end brands and then that brand puts their label on them.  Regardless, I really like the look and feel of this PJ; it is quality and buttery soft cotton.  This is the first time I tried the brand and am pleasantly surprised with the quality. In my opinion it is very similar to the quality of other well known name brands such as Carters (this Babyroom brand in my opinion is better in feel, stitching and certainly price). All cotton and tag-less pj's for toddlers are hard to find in the department stores and very expensive. These are well made, soft, true to size and wash/dry very nicely.
summary: Great Toddler PJs, 100% soft smooth cotton, tag-less, well made and durable! Really glad I found these online!

reviewText:
First of all I bought the mirror lens version so I don't know if this applies to other versions, but without further a due here's a list on why they suck.

Pros
- They got that face game on point. (sorry for crappy meme)
Cons
- How they look is all they got going for them.
- The frame is made of flimsy metal, beware of pockets with these because you might pull them out one day just to see you broke them without much effort.
- The joints while put together firmly, have a kinda sharp piece of metal sticking out when folded. Good luck grabbing them out of your pocket.
- The lens are poorly socketed making them rattle whenever you move your head. It's rather annoying.
- The "mirror" lens is more like a half mirror, making people able to see through the lens and figure out that you were peeking at butts again you pervert.
- Lens are distorted making looking through them blurry. Like seriously how do you mess up a flat plastic lens like that. DONT wear these while driving.
- Is probably better to just invest in a $200 pair of Oakleys and get on with you life.
summary: All around terrible item and I'll tell you why

Item is quite small, about a quarter of the size of a regular pocket-watch. As one might expect from the price and the fact it ships from China, the quality is anything but remarkable. That said, for the price it is crafted well enough. The white bubble 'eye' on mine had some chalky residue and the white line at the top of the eye is not a reflection from light. It's just what it looks like...a white line, LOL Easy enough to set the time for anyone familiar with pocket-watches. Comes with no instructions and is shipped in only passable quality materials.

Bottom line; if you want a cool, kitchy little party favor or bobble, then this is a great purchase for you. If you were looking for something a bit more fancy OR functional, well then....keep on looking, LOL

reviewText: I have seen this necklace all over social media and well I fell in love with it. I seen this and had to have it.  I ordered this and well to my surprise it cam earlier than expected. But first these necklaces came with a velvet drawstring bag which was pretty cool I thought. Now these necklaces.  They are stunning! Each piece of the heart themselves are actually bigger than I expected which is another bonus! The gold is polished and done beautifully! I immediately called two of my best friends over and handed them each a piece of the heart! What better piece of jewelry can you have for an adult woman to have for their friends! I know as a younger girl I was so excited to give out my best friends necklaces and now I get to do it again but instead of handing out one piece I get to choose two!! I am one happy woman and very pleased with these!

Very good quality tie, bright colors, good seams, I would by another, I did receive this at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

I received this tie after what seemed like forever after I ordered it. It is quite possible that it states somewhere that it will take some time before arrival, but I had not anticipated on it taking so long to arrive. When it arrived here, it was neatly packaged in such a way that the tie wasn't wrinkled when I opened the package. The tie is a vibrant red and even over all the fabric. It isn't silky or shimmery, it is just basic red. The tie is thick in material or so it seems, meaning I don't feel like the tie is flimsy, it feels durable and long lasting. I especially like this tie because it is long and the balance of the entire tie, to the wider part and the thinner part, are proportioned in such a way that it will balance out once the tie has been put on. With the lengthy tie it also allows for the use of creative tying without feeling like one was going to run out of what is left of the tie. The lining of the tie is black material and the stitching is nicely done, the point on the tie is perfect as well, there doesn't seem to be any miscalculations in the making of this tie that it all is proportioned as it should be. When putting on the tie it feel comfortable and not bulky, it doesn't cause friction when sliding it around to take off, or to straighten the tie, the knot doesn't come loose either. I am very happy with this purchase, and even though the shipping was lengthy I would have no problem from purchasing from here again.

I am blessed to have received this at a discount, in exchange for my honest opinion

reviewText: The Oiwas cross body purse is so handy! I ride a motorcycle with my husband a lot and needed something to go across me. This bag is perfect because, it is lightweight and semi fashionable. The material is a light nylon that reminds me of canvas and windbreaker material combined. It is extremely lightweight, even when it's loaded with stuff. It includes a cute little keychain that is attached to the strap. I love this purse. I ordered this bag at a discount in exchange for my review. However, I feel like this is a great deal.

Very nice every day bag.  Just the right size and shape for tossing in all that you need, then finding it when you need it.  In other words, the inside compartments--one main large compartment, one for a phone, one to keep several small items together, and one zippered pouch--are all easily accessible, with a long zippered top opening and not-too-deep inside.  Perfect for my needs.  There is a zippered wide pocket on the outside, too.

There is a detachable long strap that can turn the bag in a shoulder carry or across the chest carry.  Two other short strap handles prevent the bag from dragging, and allows you to keep it close to you.

It is not a "formed" bag and does not have much structure.  But it is shaped nicely, and with your larger items stored at the bottom, this bag will stand on its own.  There are also two snap button long tabs on each side to help shore up the top sides so they do not gap.  If you need a bit of extra room, just un-snap the tabs and let the bag fall free.

I really like the material.  It is nylon, but a heavy, matte nylon--definitely not thin parachute material.  (Although the inside lining is much like parachute material, maybe a touch thicker.)  The material is very nice looking, as are the contrasting colors inside and out.  And the cute hand-made, hand-stitched stuffed elephant on the outside zipper pull is darling and adds something to the overall look.

Bag is well-constructed, with straight seams and stitching.  Stitching is all finished off nicely.  Metal hardware is decent and does not clank around.  Main zipper has large plastic--not metal--teeth.

*I received a free sample product from Oiwas.
summary: Love the strong, medium-weight matte nylon material; shape is great--not too deep, but long and opens wide

reviewText:
This is a simple, handled handbag or purse that is made from a textured nylon material that feels almost like canvas to me. It comes with a strap that also allows you to carry it on your shoulder or as a cross-body bag, and it does holds a decent amount of 'stuff' for its size. Every day casual use.... and I like it.

The purse we received is about 15.5 inches across (side to side), 9 inches tall (top to bottom, excluding the handles or the strap's length) and the soft base is about 4.5 inches wide when laid flat. While not made to readily stand on its own, the construction seems very well done. I like the textured feel; the inside is nicely lined with a rose colored polyester lining, and the stitching seems well done all around.

The zippers used on the top closure and the exterior front pocket are nice and heavy duty metal zippers, while the zipper used on the interior pocket is a lighter weight nylon zipper. None of the zippers show signs of issues or stress.

This hand bad is comprised of one lined, main compartment, with measurement close to those of the bag's exterior (as noted above). There interior zippered pocket along the inside of the back wall is made to hold lipstick and keys, and is about 7 inches wide by 2 inches deep. There are two slip-in pockets on the opposite interior wall; one if 2.5 inches wide and the other 4 inches wide, and both are about 4.5 inches deep.  Between those slip-in pockets are two slip-in pen/pencil slots.

The previously mentioned zippered exterior pocket is about 8 inches wide by 5 inches deep. Overall, this handbag seems to be nicely styled and well made and the retail tag on the bag notes that it is covered by a 1 year warranty.

If you are looking for a purse of this style, size, price, color and construction, for use as I have described above, then I would recommend giving this Oiwas handbag a try based on my experience with it.

Recommended.

Go for it.

We received this item gratis from the seller, without obligation, and decided to objectively test and review it. My statements in this Amazon listing's review reflect that testing experience.
summary: Oiwas Womens Handbag - Gray - Textured nylon (feels like canvas) - Shoulder - Crossbody - Handles - Soft - Recommended

First, the color is completely off. The photo shows a nice salmon color but the top I received was a light pink that would be appropriate for a nursery.

Second, and more importantly, the cut of the shirt is completely different than what is shown. See the photo I included that shows that the shirt stops at my waist in a boxy and unflattering way rather than flowing nicely over my backside. Also note that the bottom of the cross cross area on the back does not have the cute little dramatic V cut out at the bottom of the opening, it is is just cut straight across.

Third, when I tried to return the item I was told that the best they could do was give me $1.50 back and suggested that I give the shirt to a friend:

"Dear friend,
Really sorry for inconvenience.
The size of the product is as the web, In that case,our company can not provide prepaid shipping label. Could you accept it? But I do not want you unhappy. could you give you family or friend?and i will refund you $1.50 to make up for this. could you accept it?
Do you have any other ideas? please let me know,Thank you!
Your understanding will be high appreciated. "

I'll be donating the shirt to charity. Maybe a 7 year old will enjoy it.
summary: You Get What You Pay For

reviewText:
Living on an island, I wear trunks as underwear most of the time (who knows when you'll end up wanting/needing to get in the water). I really like my TYR trunks, but at $25-$30 a pair, they're a bit on the pricey side to essentially be used as underwear, so I decided to try some cheaper options.

These fit, but aren't super comfortable. There's no room up front for the goods, so they feel a bit restricted. I'm not exactly Ron Jeremy in that department, so it's not like I'm asking these shorts to accommodate anything more than average. They also Ken doll what you do have, so if you're wanting to show off, look elsewhere, though if you are particularly modest, these may be the route to go. They fit my waist, despite my belly's growing efforts, but cut into my thighs a bit. I have some serious quads from biking for years, so that may be some of it, but it's worth noting my TYR's don't cut in at all.

The fabric isn't terribly abrasion resistant. You can tell where some of my shorts have seams because they've rubbed against these trunks and pilled them. The pilling is lighter in color, so it's fairly obvious that something is off from quite a distance. They haven't faded much, though I most of their time in the water is in salt water, so I can't really comment on their chlorine resistance.

There is a liner, and while it's not terrible (doesn't itch, doesn't hold excessive amounts of water), it covers most of the front of these, (from waistband to leg stitching, starting at the front of the thighs) and occasionally causes the leg portion to shift around in weird ways.

The stitching seemed fine at first, but I'm getting stray threads here and there, and I know I'll be at them with a needle and thread soon.

For the money, they're not bad, but I need a bit more out of trunks and will probably bite the bullet and invest in more TYRs. I'll continue to wear these when my nicer trunks are in the laundry, but I have a feeling their life will be short, and I'm ok with that. Once they area gone I won't be buying any more pairs.
summary: I really like my TYR trunks

*i received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review

These Polorized sport sunglasses by Mambo have a nice fit and form, and are very comfortable.  We purchased the black with blue accent sunglasses in a promotion for personal use, honest evaluation and review.  The nose and arms have blue rubber grips which helps prevent them slipping.  We purchased the Mario and Danica Racer Sunglasses  with my husband in mind, though they fit my narrow face nicely.  I have difficulty finding sunglasses that are not too wide, so I have been using them.  These sunglasses are durable, lightweight, and have a sleek, attractive style.

Nice looking sunglasses! I gave these to my 21-year-old son and he really likes them. They look great on him and he can see very clearly even when it very sunny outside. They look really nice on him and he says they are comfortable too. I tried them on, as well. They do feel comfortable and I liked the way they looked on me too but I had already given them to him.

In addition, I love that they give 100% UVA and UVB protection, which is very important to me. They come packed in a small sturdy box that protects them from damage. They sunglasses also come with their own pouch to store them in. This pouch can also be used to clean the sunglasses. I bought the sunglasses with blue arms with a discount. I think they look great and the quality seems very good too.

I got these sunglasses for my hubby as he loves "sports" style glasses. He's generally pretty hard to please, as he grumbles about various issues he has with a lot of glasses. Thus far- no grumbles. He says they fit him well, are comfortable, and he looks cool :) SO- happy customer! I received these glasses at a discounted price in exchange for my honest opinion.

These are great sport glasses.  There's not much I can speak to other than their fit and form, both of which are excellent.  These are very comfortable - the nose and arms have the rubber grips which helps a lot (big improvement over cheaper pairs typically).  They have subtle styling which is also appreciated.  I can feel pretty confident wearing them during physical activity too.  I have a big head, and they still fit perfectly.  They're not too tight or too lose where I fear them falling off my head.  I'd say they're a one size fits all without fuss.  If you've never gotten sunglasses better than your cheaper, plastic drug store versions you should really consider these.

For picture and color references, my pair is black.  I have received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

These glasses are great!  They are lightweight and definitely serve their purpose.  My son loves them!  I originally ordered them for my husband, but they we a little small for him.  I received this product at a discounted rate for a fair and honest review.

Lately in my family our choice is to buy sunglasses with no particular brand in mind, we mainly look for the best all around frame and lens combo. My husband's eyes are extremely sensitive to sunlight. I bought this sunglasses for him due to its wraparound style frames which are a must for blocking side light, and they do it very well. Due to my husband's work and also his passion for the outdoors there are days when he spends a lot of time outdoors, his new Mambo Polarized Sports Sunglasses are a comfortable fit that stay put, they block sunlight well, while they still let him see with clarity. This sunglasses are made of nice quality materials. They come nicely packaged and include a nice protective pouch for when they need to be put away.
I received this item at a promotional rate, this has in no way affected my opinion. This review is my opinion and has been written in my own words.
summary: A comfortable fit that stay put, and they block sunlight very well.

reviewText:
Read the sizing chart, for sure. You have to convert the sizes a bit- if you wear a medium in American sizes and you order a medium, you won't be able to so much as squish a leg in! I wear a medium normally, and a large if I want my top a bit looser, and I ordered the largest available size and it seems to fit decently enough.

The material was wholly unimpressive- it felt a bit stiff, but thin. Overall, I doubt that it will holdup in the long run- it had loose stitches which aren't a big deal to me as I tend to tailor my clothing a bit anyways. I was able to tighten them up pretty easily, but for those of you who don't do anything by means of alterations you should be aware that the hems of the sleeves, collar, and bottom of the shirt are not very snugly stitched and will likely come unravelled easily. It was also not a very comfortable material overall- it almost reminded me of a halloween costume, although not quite to that extent. You know how costumes tend to be a bit rigid, and smooth but not really soft? That's what this reminded me of.  The colors were similar to the top in the picture, but I highly doubt that the pictured shirt is the same brand that I recieved- the one in the picture is clearly of a higher quality. But in the end, it's decent enough for being so cheap of a price. I'll likely hand wash it to buy it some life, and it's pretty casual, however I know that I will not be adding this one to my list of suggested buys for friends and such. If you don't care that it's a bit of work to maintain, go ahead and buy it- but know that you get what you pay for, which is to say not much.
summary: Unimpressed, but also what I expected for the price

reviewText:
I have been searching for some dresses with higher necklines appropriate to wear in to professional school (a healthcare graduate program) after having it brought to my attention by my man that I tend to wear quite a few low cut items. This dress fit the bill. I am somewhat leery of buying dresses/clothing online as I'm super picky about fit as an a larger girl over all at 5'11" and 190 lbs.

I am thrilled I took the plunge and ordered this dress! The fit is amazing. I was careful to order according to the manufacturers sizing and am so happy I did! I do have to make one adjustment and increase the arm hole size by reseaming the shoulder seams. Thankfully, the manufacturer actually left enough seam allowance (which is very rare nowadays) for custom tailoring if needed. I am happy with the fabric as well. The print is great and fabric feels good on, and seems to have a little stretch. I have purchased a petticoat since I am going for the full skirt look. I am pleasantly surprised by the lack of show through and don't think I will need to wear a slip to hide my bra, despite having ordered the white cherry pattern.

I do wish there was a coordinating button up, cropped sweater I could buy to wear with this dress from the same company to complete my '50's look! I am seriouslycjbsudering ordering another dress in black.
very well constructed

The description of this "rag" is completely misleading regarding size and quality. This is a basic design which any child learning how to sew could do a better job. The stitching is uneven and has loose threads which most likely would unravel with the first washing. I am only 5'3" size medium and could not even get my arms into the sleeves. I have never written a negative review however felt compelled to warn other potential Amazon customers with regard to this product. I love this bag! I bought it for work to store my laptop and on ear headphones. It also has enough room to store my keys, tablet, and charging cables. It has a good quality look and feel to it, and I get compliments on the bag all the time. Plus, it's surprisingly comfortable while wearing.

First off, it's a fantastic looking bag.  It's a little darker than the photo, it looks more like a grayed denim.  That's ok though, because it adds to the look.  Sometimes you have to worry about canvas bags being too rigid when you first get them, this one is very pliable and has a broken in feel.  As other comments have noted, there is no structure for laptops, so it's buyer beware if you're using this as a laptop bag.  My only real complaint is that there is no handle on the top of the bag, this sounds petty, but picking it up by the shoulder strap or just grabbing a handful of the bag is annoying.  I will continue to use the bag though because it looks great and so far is very durable.
summary: Great looking messenger bag with plenty of space

reviewText: Bag exceeded my expectations.  I got this bag for my husband to use for work.  He is famously "rough" on his gear and this bag seems up to the challenge.  Canvas material is thick with solid heavy sticking, no fears of rips or tears.  Strap is also sturdy and cushion shoulder piece can slide along strap so you can adjust it to your need.  Color is slightly even better in person, leather straps have perfect amount of vintage looking wear that looks great, not cheap. Lots of pockets for accessories and cords.  Large enough to fit my husband's large laptop, this bag is not padded so lap top sleeve is recommended if you use it for this.  Overall, great product! My husband loves it and he's not easily impressed. This product was given to me in exchange for honest, non biased review.

reviewText: Works perfectly. Make sure to charge it all the way and use the manual signal finder.
As expected

Absolutely nothing to dislike.  Watch is very nice looking and does just what it is supposed to do: keep accurate time.  It also holds a good glow at night.  The solar light is a very nice touch and very effective in keeping the watch charged.

Probably too soon to write a review -- I usually like to bang my things around a bit before making judgement.  For what it's worth, thus far this watch serves my needs. Keeps perfect computer time -- no problem with Colorado signal out here on the west coast.  Mineral crystal dial -- important.  Who wants to carry a watch with a scratched-up plastic face?  Use as a pocket watch, so the band is of no concern.  Just enough functions to make sense.  Too many unused functions adds unnecessary complication.  Like that one can sync the second hand should it go out of  sync with digital signal time.  The buttons on this watch are responsive.  I've owned watches that developed button-clog-gum-up, making watch adjustment problematic.  Hopefully, this watch will not develop same problem.  Good price, handsome watch. Too bad this watch isn't offered in a pocket version.
Watch did not keep accurate time and did not reset at time change. Had to do it manually. Also near impossible to read digital info. in little box at bottom of face. Have returned it for refund.

reviewText: Deceptive advertising! It's a nice looking watch but A) it ran fast and B) this watch is suppose to connect to the atomic tower in Colorado (US) to keep accurate time and it didn't. Every time I tried to do a manual connection per the instructions, it would always come back with a "NO" for no connection. I called the company and they actually told me that watch only connects to the tower in Europe. WTF! How can you advertise and even have settings for all around the world if it'll only pick up one out of 3 towers? Returned for a refund.
summary: It's a nice lookingwatch but A) it ran fast and B) ...

The belt was cam in a really nice box which is also perfect for a gift. This belt is fit him perfect and really comfortable for him and it really look nice on him. I originally thought it was pricey, but after seeing the quality, modesty and versatility- I highly recommend it to any Apostolic (or other faiths with similar holiness standards) who wishes to stay active. reviewText:
I've never been so proud to show off my love for tentacle based hentai.

I mean, after viewing the item on Amazon, and also the manufacturer's website, I was really torn: All 4 styles are made out of sterling silver, while 2 are plated. I ruled out the gold immediately since I generally prefer silver and platinum.

The antique and dark versions are exactly the same, only with varying levels of oxidation. I would have really loved the antique one with absolutely no oxidation at all - Say, a simple polished silver. The reason I'm not a fan of the oxidation is because it gives it a pewter like finish, and I would much rather tarnish the silver on my own.

So that left me with the shiny one, which is rhodium plated. After contacting the manufacturer, I found out that there is no nickel between the silver and the rhodium - Which made me really excited! If you know anything about rhodium, you'll know that it does wear off with time, but keeps your ring shiny for as long as possible. But if there's nickel underneath the rhodium, well, that usually doesn't look so good. In this case there isn't, so as the rhodium wears off, it will start to tarnish and spot in a more natural way, ultimately becoming the antique version. I knew right away this is what I wanted, and I am not disappointed! Keep in mind, it may take literal years for rhodium plating to wear off. It's generally quite durable, being a type of platinum, making your jewelry almost look like white gold. (In fact, most white gold is plated with rhodium.)

The ring itself is very attractive, and VERY comfortable to wear. I could wear it all day without it bothering me, and that's a huge plus. Adjusting it to your preferred size is a breeze. There's also no mistake of what it is - Everyone who has seen it has complimented it right away, being able to tell that it was an aquatic tentacle design. I couldn't be more excited. Each 'sucker' on the tentacle is well defined, and nothing feels smudged or podged together. It's very well made with good detail definition!

While I received this item at a discount for my honest review, I'm extremely excited about it. This is easily my favorite, if not best, piece of jewelry in my collection. Also, don't be afraid of contacting the manufacturer - They're very responsive and helpful!
summary: I've never been so proud to show off my love for tentacle based hentai

I wear a 34B. Size S shirts. 110lb. Even though its a one-size bra, I think its most appropriately a S or M. The bra itself it really stretchy but I don't think I would recommend above a B or a structured C (like, implant C not normal/unstructured fat C- terrible explanation I know-- but maybe it makes sense?). Just because the bra itself gives no structure. So a non-structured boob would have fat flowing over the sides near the armpit.  The inside cups are removable which I recommend because they are just an odd fit, maybe too small for a B but might look nice with an A or smaller B. Anyways I took them out and the bra fits fine for my size. I bought it mostly for the cool back straps which are indeed really cool and nice to wear with open back shirts or tanks. reviewText:
I bought this necklace, as my previous pentagram necklace broke from the chain. I like this necklace because even though it is a fairly big necklace, the symbol is less known and more "subtle" than the pentagram necklace.

Pros:
Clear image, It is a very pretty design.
Durable (I do snowboarding and working out and such, this necklace holds up really well)
The symbol is fairly large, the length of your thumb.
It sits nicely in the dead center of your chest.
One of the things i like the most about this necklace is the fact that the pendant doesn't move on the chain. so you never run the chance of having the clip on the necklace in front.

Cons:
The picture is very misleading, when I bought this i assumed that the necklace was more three dimmensional, but it is flat.
It feels very cheaply made, because of the plastic it is very light and overall doesn't "feel" like a $20 necklace.
The center oval with the sigil of Leviathan is indented in the necklace so food crumbs/dirt can get in the edges and ruin the quality. I had to use one of my switchblades to get the dirt out.
The design on the outer part, on a close up inspection, looks as if someone spray painted the black paint on it, and it is beginning to face with me messing around with it.

All in all, I do like this necklace, but probably not enough to pay $20 for it. I think if this necklace lasts for a long time, I may change my mind.

I bought the white fleck color, 3X size of this shirt and it fits very well on me (I am a full figured woman).  I liked how the sleeve length wasn't too short, it reached to about 2 inches above my elbows.  The collar was the right fit, not too tight or loose.  The fabric is very soft but a little see through; I usually wear a camisole underneath.  The neck tag is soft too, I hardly notice it's there.  I have washed this in the gentle/delicate cycle with cool water followed up with the same delicate settings in the dryer several times.  So far the shirt has not shrunk nor been misshapen.  The letters still remain legible on the shirt.  What really drew me to this shirt was the design: it's very Harry Potter geek-chic without being over-the-top.  I feel comfortable wearing it to the office on casual Fridays.  Overall I am really happy with this purchase.

You will also need a slip because your underwear will also be visible if you don't, however I didn't find that a problem.  The dress had a few wrinkles when I got it and they ironed out very easily.  The fabric is a soft silky fabric it is very light weight and works very well as a summer dress.  I did give it four stars because my daughter loves the print on the dress and it will work perfectly for her with some minor modifications like a slip and undershirt.  I liked that it had cap sleeves, was modest, and my daughter said it was comfortable to wear.  I received this dress at a discounted price in exchange for my honest unbiased review.  I take great pride in my reviews and always tell the truth whether good or bad.

reviewText:
As it states in my title, make sure that you remove ALL of the plastic or the watch will not start. After you unwrap the face of the watch, there is another piece of plastic on the back of the watch!!!

This watch is beautiful. It keeps excellent time. It hasn't ran fast or slow. I'm hoping that it doesn't start doing that because so far I am impressed with how well it keeps times. You definitely have to wear it the majority of the day or it will stop, before you wind it again in the morning. When you wind it each morning, wind it clockwise .. which should be going in the direction away from you .. if you're holding the watch face up in the palm of you hand. After you wind it, MAKE SURE, that you repeat the step of holding it and swinging you arms 45 times .. this will help it stay wound for the rest of the day while you wear it. If your watch is like the one that I received, you have to set it counter clockwise. You can turn it the other way but it will turn the hands backwards, which I don't think makes a difference, but just to make sure I set it with the hands going clockwise.

The first day, I wound it, set it .. held it face and swung my arm 45 times and it lasted until the next day.  I didn't wind it in the morning, the second day that I had it  .. so it stopped the following morning. It comes with an instruction booklet, a nationwide warranty and thank you card, and a KS tag in a nice box. If I know that I have to take it off for any reason, then I swing it the 45 times once .. sometimes twice depending on how long I plan on keeping it off.

I'm giving it 5 stars because it is a beautiful watch, and it works very well if you follow the instructions as closely as you possibly can.
summary: Make sure that you take off all of the plastic or it will not start!!

reviewText:
This blouse actually fits better than expected. I thought it might be a bit tight but it fits really good. It's mostly a stretchy material (besides the lace, of course) that is pretty form fitting. So, it shows every little bulge, roll, nook, and cranny! LOL. I'm a curvy girl, so I find it looks best with a body slimmer underneath, without it, I hate the way my stomach looks and it settings in my love handles.

I like how long the blouse is - it covers my rear, which is my preferred style (I've always liked long shirts and blouses). It would look great with leggings. I've been wearing it with jeans and it looks great, as well. The lace on the backside does show a lot of your back area, so if you're not comfortable with that, you can wear a camisole underneath and it looks fine.

The sleeves have little cuffs on the bottom that help them stay in place - the sleeves don't ride up. I'm not sure if this would be best for Fall or Spring. I guess that depends on your personal preference. In the Spring, it could be hot in some regions since it is long sleeved and black; it can be a bit hot on warmer days. I've worn it on cool nights with a jean jacket and was comfortable.

I have been washing on a delicate cycle with like items - and with only a few items in the load. I can see it getting ruined pretty easily if you treat it like any other piece of clothing. It's by no means a top-quality blouse, but it's great for going out with friends, running errands (if you want to look dressy casual), and things of that nature.

A free sample was provided for evaluation and review.
summary: Fits as expected and fits close to body - form fitting. Shows things you may not want to be seen! ;) Cute, though.

reviewText: I love this Women's Lightweight 3/4 Sleeve Batwing Lace Panel Shirt Casual Dolman Top by HDE. It's made from 100% cotton and I think the quality is very good. This blouse is very pretty. It's super soft and stretchy. The lace on the back and sleeves adds some sexiness to it. It has 3/4 sleeves but my arms are short so they are like regular long sleeves for me and I like that they are long. I got the black top in a size Large. I would have preferred an X-Large but the Large fits just fine due to the stretchiness. This blouse looks really nice with some black leggings. It will be good for everyday to wear with jeans and leggings or to dress it up with a cute skirt. I machine washed it on casual cycle and hung it to dry and it turned out great. I am really happy with this blouse. My husband likes how it looks on me so that's a plus. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are based on my own experiences.
summary: Very nice Lace Panel Shirt Casual Dolman Top

There is a piece of seal sticking out of the caseback. The bezel has some bubbling on the right side (over the crown) This is a $20 automatic mechanical watch, so I wasn't expecting top tier quality, but it is something you should keep in mind when buying a watch like this.
summary: Really nice, but a few visual flaws.

We brought two checkbook covers from this company as we loved the designs and quality. The leather check divider is an especially nice feature as when my husband writes checks he presses down hard and this prevents the other checks from being damaged.

Beautifully made, perfectly dyed, smells great and I would love to keep and use it, BUT -- the leather is so stiff and the pockets have been made with so little tolerance that I can't fit my checkbook or check register into the pockets.  Also I thought I would be able to keep a pen in the center fold, but again the stiff leather and tight sizing prevents this as well.  If Oberon would increase the sizing by just 1/8 to 1/4" and include a clear flap instead of a solid leather flap I would definitely buy this larger size and be happy to show it off everyday.  I don't use duplicate checks, but I like to use the flap to hold my register open to the newest page, the solid leather flap covers the top half of the register, whereas a clear plastic flap would allow me to see the entries.
Look the way it looked, awesome job!
Beautifully crafted!

Good solid leather, with a pocket on either side for checkbook and register, plus a leather flap for NCR checks.  Couldn't ask for better quality.  The aesthetics are superb, deep, three-dimensional artwork.  You can always tell an Oberon piece by its particular aesthetics.  To be fair, I have been buying Oberon work for at least 30 years at the SoCal Renaissance Faire -- checkbooks, pouches, wallets, notebooks and more, so knew exactly what I was buying when I suddenly needed a check book cover. (I mean really, who writes checks any more? But suddenly I needed to, and went here immediately to replace the plastic thing from the bank.)  This cover  is not cheap -- the free one works -- but it will last for ever. And I consider it an excellent value, given the quality and the art. I still have 30 year old Oberon pieces in use daily. Oh -- check out the matching cell phone covers, btw.  (Yes, I have that too.)
summary: Super Quality, Wondrous Designs, Good Value

reviewText: This is an awesome wallet and just as described. I love the vintage look and feel.  I have used it for 3 weeks and it is doing perfect.  The stitching is heavy duty and looks like it will last. This makes a great front pocket wallet for me when I just take a credit card and I'd and cash.  I usually carry around 5 to 10 bills and the fit perfectly.  This is not an ultra slim wallet or a thick wallet.  Kind of inbetween.

This simplistic wallet will easily fit into your back pocket, it is completely trendy because of the EDC minimalist fashion. Being into this EDC madness, I must admit this wallet is nice looking because of the brush out effect. The leather is beautiful (though less red in truth than you can see in the video). In terms of dimensions, the wallet is 110 x 85 mm and contains one pocket only. I would say the leather is 1.2 mm thick. The nice thing about it is that it is typically the kind of leather that is going to show a nice patina with time. As for the rest, I think it appears on the video. I think a nice addition to this would be a credit card pocket on the backside of the wallet but it still is quite a nice piece of leather. Sturdy enough to last years and years. I was sent this wallet in exchange for a fair and honest review. And this is a nice product.

I wear a true size 8 shoe but these are closer to a size 7 or 7 1/2. I put them next to my size 8 Crocs and they are at least a half inch shorter. Also, only one of the two pairs is one piece construction. The other one must be an older version as it has the cut out toe post instead. I would have given them four stars except for the sizing issue.

as they are much smaller than a 7 - more like a size 6 -

If you do, be aware there will more than likely be some boobage showing under and of course cleavage up top.  This is okay for me as the suit was purchased for a trip to an island and there will not be many people there :)  Overall I still love the suit and the bottoms and would more than likely purchase again.

I'm sure you could achieve a better fit with some altering but it wasn't a big deal to me so I just left it unaltered. I'm a 34B size 2 at 5'7" and got the size 2. The front of the dress was a bit longer (which could also be altered if wanted) but still fit comfortably. Another side note that I will add is if you're not sure about "the dress" you could buy the dress try it on see how you like it and return it if you're not pleased and if you have amazon prime then why not?!! reviewText: Hi -- I got myself one of these for Christmas, to replace a nice Omega DeVille that has gone AWOL, and a nice automatic that needs the eccentric winder weight re-mounted (don't use automatics while pounding in timber spikes -- my mistake).  So after having lived in Switzerland for 5 years and knowing about 0.3% of what there is to know about the Swiss watch industry, I'll get to the point:  This is a nice piece, and the price is about what the battery replacement costs on a luxury brand.  I just set the date, and there is a very precise and instant response to the crown that motivated me to share.  So don't be fooled by the price, the Swiss CAN crank out a very nice, accurate timepiece that holds up, looks good, and impressively, feels very very high quality... at a very affordable price.  It looks nice, with very crisp numerals and indicator hands, and good proportions to my taste.  It has the basic features of a chronometer, very directly accessible and useable -- no perpetual calendar and other "grande complications", but it rewards, as noted, with pleasant, nearly instant setting of the date and nice feel to the operation.  Some compromises: The glass is mineral, so it likely won't resist scratching to quite the same degree as sapphire glass on expensive models, but 2 months in (and a few direct hits later -- remodeling), there is zero scratching.  The chrono second hand is a little hard to see, but you quickly figure out how to deal with it.  It is also a little heavy, but that comes with the chronometer package.  I find it is safer to take it off for some sports like skiing and ice skating, I fell one time and the watch slid into my wrist joint, painful.  Other than those minor quibbles, it's a solid, very rewarding piece.  Battery is user-changeable, so you can likely expect very little expense in the long term to keep the piece running.  I like it.
summary: A lot of Swiss for a very very reasonable price.

reviewText:
This necklace is amazing! It doesn't look inexpensive and it's quite a statement piece that will wear well with many different outfits! Can't wait to continue wearing it more, looks very nice but is somewhat heavy after hours of wear. Want to try the other colors too!

I was provided the opportunity to order this product for a discounted price in order to write an honest review. Please ask any questions you many have to make an informed decision!
This necklace is so pretty!  I bought this for my daughter for her birthday.  She loves it!  Lovely necklace.  I did get this at a discount for my honest review of the product.

I was a little worried about the purchase based on some of the reviews I read, but it arrived quickly, wrapped in layers of bubble wrap and seems to be a good piece of jewelry. It has some weight to it, but it's not heavy.  Really happy I made the purchase. I gave this to my friend for her birthday and she loved it. It can be worn for a variety of occasions. So far it has held up well, and I was surprised by how nice it looked considering the price. I gave it to her in a nice jewelry box to class things up. Now I want to get one for myself!
I would also like to note that I only choose to receive products at a discounted price in exchange for my unbiased review if they are products I was already interested in and thinking of purchasing. All observations and comments are my own. Please don't hesitate to leave your comments or to ask me questions.
Looks great even from close

I don't usually where such big, bold jewelry however this piece is absolutely timeless and classic. It reminds me of something Audry Hepburn would wear. This is not cheap costume jewelry. It is of good quality and I'm sure will last me a long time. The piece comes folded in 3 sections, so each individual tear drop is not loose. Since it is more solid, it holds it shape very nicely when worn. I was concerned about that before I received it but nothing to worry about. I was also worried that it would be loud. You know, the jewelry that makes noises as you move. Thankfully this does not make a peep. Its a quite necklace:)

My only complaint would be that it hangs lower than I would have wanted when clasped in the middle, however you can adjust it to any tightness. I may just adjust it to fit shorter on me since I have some jewelry tools and have done that before. Overall, this necklace is another staple to my wardrobe. I love the other colors and will probably order those too. However I must say, the black and gold go with almost anything and add a very classy feel to any outfit. I was given a discount to provide my honest review of this product.

It's a lovely necklace, and IS as described by the seller. It looks a bit smaller than I expected for some reason. Also, I expected it to have some white in it, like two white pieces on top of each black one, but it's all black (as seen from the second photo below). If I can make a suggestion to the seller, I would ask them to photograph it on a couple of different color backgrounds so that it's clear there is no white in it. It's light enough and won't tangle because it's actually made of 5 bigger blocks, not separate black pieces chained together. The chain is long enough, and can be shortened at the closure to any length - the links are large enough for the lobster claw to grab at.

Overall, it's a nice necklace, and I gave it 4 stars because it just weren't up to my expectations (i.e. I like it, not love it), but did fit the seller's description. This is my honest review of this product, as agreed, in exchange for a discounted price.

reviewText: I received my ring this morning and it was ordered a couple days ago. Fits perfect size 8.5 and not a single scratch on it. It's heavy and it shines and recommend it highly. YOU WILL NOT BE SORRY. 10mm which I love.

First some background... I work in construction, and have been notoriously hard on my wedding bands.
I started with gold bands, and literally broke a couple of them (and I mean broke, clean through), they were sold for their gold weight. I then went for years without a wedding band (apologies to my wife). Then titanium rings came on the market. I bought one, and pretty much destroyed it in two weeks. It didn't break, but it looked awful. Again I went without for a couple of years. Now these tungsten carbide rings have come around. After the years that I have spent in construction, I have learned some things about metallurgy, and was intrigued.
I thought I would give it a try.
Now to the ring.
Okay, first of all, this thing is a beast. The first thing you will notice is the weight. It feels substantial (like gold). The next thing you'll notice is the feel, it is smooth!!! This ring has held up to my rough treatment phenomenally well. On close inspection, I can't see a scratch on it.
If you live a rough, and active lifestyle, I would highly recommend this ring. One bit of advice, this was the first comfort fit band I have bought, and I think because of the smooth rounded surfaces, it felt loose. After a couple of tries I ended up with a size 11 ring, whereas my previous non-comfort fit ring was a size 12... I ordered this owl necklace from dzt1968.

For only a couple bucks (and coming from another country), I was wary about buying this.  I half-expected it to be made of cheap material or not arrive in the time or condition it stated.

I could not have been more wrong!  It arrived an entire week before Amazon's earliest estimation, and in perfect condition, too!

Not only that, but the actual product itself is absolutely beautiful.  Believe me when I say that the picture does not do it justice.

The aqua-colored stones are a great hue against the very vintage-feeling bronze-colored metal.  (I had some misgivings in ordering because in the picture, the metal seems to clash color-wise in it being a yellow-ish due to the lighting, but it looks so much better in person!)

Another thing about the metal (chain specifically) is that it doesn't feel like most in the way it gives the impression of being antique, as an alloy chain.  Definitely what I was looking for.

The chain is quite long (the owl hung to about the middle of my chest); it's simple to unclasp and reclasp.  (Though I was also able to just pull it over my head, too.)

All in all, the service was exemplary and the product is incredibly stunning.  Would definitely order from them again, and if you're on the fence, I say get it!  :)
