reviewText:
Im using these as glove liners and am coming from Smartwools excellent merino wool liner gloves, so thats my basis for comparison here. I recently got frostnip on a hiking trip (too much time with my heavy gloves off, messing around with my camera and tripod in sub-zero temperatures) and wanted to beef up my glove/liner game both to protect my fingers as they heal and to prevent something like that from happening again. My research indicated that these were possibly the warmest glove liners money could buy.

First off, these are definitely warmer glove liners than the Smartwools. Im not sure though if thats because they're buffalo down instead of merino, or simply because they are a noticeably bulkier knit. They are definitely thicker, and I think that has more to do with their warmth than the fancy material.

However, they are not as well made as the Smartwools. They aren't badly made by any means, but where Smartwools liners cling to my hands perfectly and preserve almost all of my dexterity, these are a bit saggier and the fingertips are a bit lumpier. Theyre not bad, just not quite as good. They also don't have touchscreen-compatible fingertips, which the Smartwools do. Note that the Smartwools are $25 whereas these cost $95. I get that bison down is inherently expensive, but if Im paying $95 for a knit glove I expect the construction to be excellent, not just good.

Also, they run a bit large. Experience has taught me time and time again that I need a mens medium when Im buying gloves. These are more like size large, meaning that they're a little bit baggy. If I were to order these again (which I wont, as I don't think they're worth the cost) Id order them in a size small.
These are great gloves for keeping warm!  They do pill a bit, but are very warm!

Absolutely the softest and most comfortable gloves I have ever worn. Also quite warm. I tried a pair at a local sheep and wool festival, so I knew they felt wonderful. Given how very expensive they are, I hesitated to buy them for a long time, but they are definitely worth it. Not particularly grippy, so not a great choice for driving, but excellent for general outdoor wear.
They were really nice gloves, but I returned them because they were fingerless.  My husband has diabetes and need a full glove.

reviewText:
These shoe socks are absolutely adorable!!! I used to buy baby shoes but my baby outgrew the shoes before I could use it more than a dozen times.

She has used this set for several months and I bought them when she was around 5 months. They fit perfect then and they still fit perfect now, several months later. They don't kick off easy, either. They wash really well. The color has not faded nor has the bow warped. You get a few little lint balls every now and then but that stopped when i started washing them inside out.

I recommend these for baby shower gifts due to the amount of attention they receive! Parents often stop me and say how clever the socks are and how they wish they knew about them when their child was a baby.

reviewText: This top runs true to size. The quality is very good, and the material is substantial. It's not two tops layered; the mesh/fishnet parts are sewn on to the tank top. The piece around the neck comes up a little high, almost to the neck. It actually looks cool if you don't tie the halter strap, and let it hang down for a different look. The dragon design looks good, but is a tad pixelated. I recommend this top if you're looking for a different, edgy piece..

reviewText: I wish more people would include information about their build when reviewing clothing, I find it very useful when deciding what size to order. As for myself, I am 5' 7", thin to average size build, and I went with the size S. The pajama top was pretty roomy on me, I could wear another shirt underneath. The waistband of the pants was perfect, not too loose or too tight. Overall I'm satisfied with the way it fit me, it was pretty much what I expected. My biggest complaint is about the length of the sleeves and pants, which I wish were longer. Maybe these pajamas were not made for such lanky people as I. Also...why is the neck hole so huge? The purpose of these pajamas is to be warm, right?

It is a bit hard to decide on a star rating for these marled navy pajamas.  I should know better than to order anything that is not petite.  Regular "small" means the sleeves and legs will be too long for me, no matter what type of garment it is, so regrettably I had to return the product.  I also had not noticed the word "marled" and thought the picture was showing the gray color, not the navy.  Marled means "mottled or streaked" and indeed this is a mottled navy and gray, rather an attractive look if you are not looking for solid navy.  The fabric was quite nice, a little stretchy and fairly thick.  It looked like it would keep its shape through many washings if washed inside out in cold water as they suggest.  I'm sorry it didn't work out because it was quite comfortable and well-made.  So the fault is really with the person ordering, not the product.  As I increasingly use Amazon for more retail purchases other than perishable groceries, I need to hone my skills!  Read everything on the product page carefully, double-check size and quantity.  Amazon is great about accepting returns, but sloppy ordering wastes time on both ends.

I'm just very surprised by the length of the legs and arms being so short, because usually I have the opposite problem. I'm thrilled with my purchase even though it wasn't what I thought at first, it's turned out fine... nice feel, nice fabric, but I think they may be shrinking a bit in the length. I'll write again if they get too much shorter.
summary: Love the bottoms, gave away the tops

reviewText: Very comfortable! The navy color is almost more of a gray--you can see the navy up close but it's very subtle. I actually prefer it to a bluer navy color. I got a pair of these to take to the hospital when I had my baby and ended up ordering another one. I wore them pretty much every day during my maternity leave. Super comfy and they look good enough to wear when we had visitors or to walk outside for a bit.

reviewText: But it is the nature of these types of pajamas. Additionally, when I sleep, I like the clothing pieces to be loose. I ordered an extra large, but I am usually a medium or a large. I love the pajamas -- but these are somewhere between long johns (tight) and pajamas.
summary: Fun pajamas -- very comfy for sleeping

reviewText: So Comfy!!!

After reading some of the reviews, I ordered these a size larger than what I would normally wear. I like to just throw my PJ's in the washer and dryer. They looked huge when they came out of the package, but did shrink to my size! These are the softest, most comfortable PJ's I've ever owned. They're stretchy so movement in bed at night isn't a problem. I plan to order another pair.
the collar neck is wide, but the rest fits right.
Great
Very cute! Arrived quickly too. Fabric is not quite as soft as other footed PJs but my son loves them!
Fabric is thin
AWESOME!!! Love these soooo much :)  Have ordered every size from 6 months and couldn't be happier.

These pajamas would be 5 stars except the title is misleading. My 4 year old daughter wanted some new summer-weight astronaut pajamas so we hopped on Amazon together and searched for astronaut pajamas. These looked good but it says "Baby Boys 2015 Footed Sleeper Pajama", so I told her we would have to get them for her brother instead. She was so mad and disappointed that I couldn't find any girls astronaut pajamas. Anyway, when they arrived for my son two days later, I was pretty mad that I didn't get what was advertised. The Amazon listing clearly say BOYS pajamas so I expected a place for a penis to go - maybe a little built-in jockstrap or something. I don't know - I'm not a man so I have no idea how these things works, I just figured there had to be some difference because otherwise wouldn't it just say "Baby 2015 Footed Sleeper Pajama"? Since these pajamas were clearly NOT BOYS' pajamas, I gave them to my daughter instead. (Incidentally, she informed me that half of NASA's astronaut latest class is 50% female.)

These are in fact lightweight - perfect for summer. They seem to run somewhat small - I thought they'd be a little big on her but instead I think she'll outgrow them in a couple months. Smaller than Carter's PJs. The fabric gets stretched out easily around the knees and other places she bends, and it looks much lighter in color when it's stretched out. But my budding astronaut doesn't mind one bit.  And as long as she's happy with them, I'm happy.
summary: No penis holder: they are actually GIRLS' pajamas!

reviewText: Fits perfectly. would order again

I've been buying these pajamas for my son since he was 2 years old (he's 4 now).  They fit him well, are so soft on his skin, have cute designs, and don't fade or pill after many washes.  Also, most importantly for me, they don't shrink in the laundry.  With other brands, the arms of pajams can become really tight over time.  But, with these, I can wash and dry to my heart's content without worry.  As soon as I notice pajamas getting snug because my son is growing, I log right on to Amazon and order more Leveret pajamas. I buy many, many things from Amazon (2 packages a week on average!) and this is honestly the first review I've written in years because I have had such a great experience with this product.  Happy buying!
summary: Fantastic pajamas - hold up well in wash!

reviewText: Out of all the pajamas I purchased for my 2-year-old toddler son, this one is the best. I unfortunately had to get a size 4t bc of the trend of super tight fitting pajamas. I have read so many similar complaints about that and I don't know what kind of fire hazard they expect a child in modernity to get exposed to. There is probably some sort of weird regulation that I am ignorant of. My son is tall and somewhat skinny (95% in height and 50% in weight), but still I have to buy a larger size so his legs can fit in width.  The zipper has cover on top and this is very important for comfort I have found. The material stands up to wash and is the right thickness in my opinion.
summary: Great quality, but as tight as all the others.

reviewText: The material is a tad stiffer than another pair of the same brand pj's.

I buy 4T so there's some room for my child to grow into the clothes, but these run very small.  As in can't get them zipped.  Like 2 sizes too small.  Am returning the 4T but will likely buy a larger size once the refund comes back.  Good price on 100% cotton, stitching and seams are quality and colors are nice - just run too small.

We discovered this brand looking for a Halloween costume last year and fell in love with the set we ordered. So when it came time to grab more toasty pajamas for the ever-growing creature that is my son, we searched to see what else they had.

He's obsessed with mustaches so this fit the bill perfectly! As with the last batch, the fabric is soft straight from the packaging. Thick enough to be warm but no so much as to be stiff.

And more importantly, they put up with anything my little 3 year old dishes out and then some.

While he's at the top of the sizing tier for footie pajamas, we're looking forward to one more toasty winter!

When considering the price, these are well worth the often-discounted tag on Amazon!
these little sleepers are so great they are all cotton which I love and the fit is ferfect the only place I could find these was on Amazon. thanks for a great item

I purchased this ring as a wedding band for my soon-to-be husband who is entering the Army. Due to the nature of his job, he needed a ring that would not bend or scratch, but also could be removed without a special cutter if his hand would become swollen.  After much research, I decided that tungsten would be the best bet for him.  There are a lot of tungsten options out there, but he wanted something that was somewhat celtic (I know it does not have celtic knot in the title, but it is similar).  I contacted WCJ about the possiblility to engrave the ring because that was really important to me.  They were amazing to work with and I am very impressed with the ring. The ring is well made, smooth, and came exactly as pictured.  The sizing was acurate and true to the measurement we got at a jewelry store.  The engraving is great and really made the ring special!  Great ring, great company, and really great price!

This neoprene multicolor bikini set is a nice bikini for the beach.  It's a little weird that it's so stiff, but that's the nature of the neoprene.  It definitely feels like a wet suit, but it looks great on.  I ordered a Medium which is my normal size, but it definitely fits small.  The quality is nice material, and no loose strings or loose stitches.  The colors are very vibrant and look great together.  The top is padded, but the padding comes out easily.  The top straps are adjustable and fit well.  The straps are also removable so you can wear it as a tube top as well.  The quality is great and it should last a long time.  It does have a plastic clasp on the back, just like many other bathing suits.  I did receive this item at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion.
summary: This neoprene multicolor bikini set is a nice bikini for the beach

reviewText:
This is a very pretty robe which I was able to buy, thanks to a generous relative who gave me a gift card.

Pros:

1. The robe looks like the picture, which is often not the case.
2. It has pockets which took me a little while to find, but they're there.
3. While it isn't super soft, it is comfortable. I'm sure that it'll get softer and softer the more it's washed.
4. It has a small loop that can be used to hang on a hook.
5. It doesn't shrink much, even after being washed in warm water and dried on the "cotton" setting.
6. It's a good weight--not too heavy, but not too light, either.

Cons:

1. It runs big. I'm a plus-sized woman, and the robe wraps around me to the extent that the left pocket is almost completely hidden. I think this robe would probably fit a 20-22 well as long as one doesn't have huge arms.
2. It doesn't have an inside tie. I've gotten used to having that on other robes, and I kind of miss having one here.

Overall, I'm happy with this robe because it's pretty, and it's comfortable. I might even buy another one if it goes further down in price. Otherwise, I'll be content with wearing this one for many years to come.

I was very unhappy with this robe initially, but have grown to love it with time. The reason I didn't like it at first was that it smelled like Fabreze.  I had to wash it many, many times to get the odor out. However, I love the fabric and design and I now wear it all the time.

reviewText: Super cute but a little skinny for my taste. My daughter loves it though.

These pajamas are so cute! I have been buying the Leveret two piece pajamas for a couple of years and love the colors (especially the stripes) and the quality of those. With winter my son always seems to lose his blanket sometime in the night so I thought footie pajamas would be a good choice. I also wanted some that were 100% cotton so I wouldn't have to worry about the fire retardant chemicals they spray on non-cotton pajamas. I was a little disappointed when these arrived because the fabric was lighter weight than I was expecting. It seemed thinner than the cotton used in the two piece pajama sets and I was worried it would develop holes. Well, they have. We haven't had them all that long and there is already a hole in the bottom of one of the feet and another hole starting where the zipper cover flap attaches. If they had been a thicker fabric I think they might be more durable and I would have given 5 stars. My son loves them though so we'll keep wearing them until they turn to shreds or he grows out of them. I also wish these were available in larger sizes. I bought the largest size they come in and he will outgrow them soon.
summary: like them but would love them if they were a little thicker fabric

I didn't notice any strings hanging out or snares in the fabric. While the color is black, the material has some other colors infused in it, giving it more of a metallic look.

The fit is very forgiving and this type of shirt looks really nice over skinny jeans. I wore it over silver ones and it matched perfectly. Also, the length of it is great because it does not ride up or show skin when bending forward.  The shirt can be worn during the day or even for a night out.

As far as the make of this tank top goes though, it does fit a 22/24! The material is very soft and breathable, and does not shrink after washing. I don't think I would buy anything orange from this company again fearing the color may not be what I want, but I would absolutely buy this tank top again because it is very well made and very comfortable just need a different color is all. The fascinator is a perfect replica of what is seen in the photos on the listing. The netting is long and can be manipulated to be wide or thin and long. What I loved about the piece is that the long in plentiful mesh allows for some variety on what you can do with the piece. The only downside to the piece is that the comb is a little flimsy for my tastes and the diamond looks bigger in person so it is a bit gaudy. The fascinator overall is a cute piece.

reviewText:
I often take walks with my granddaughter in her stroller and I got tired of carrying a regular purse while I did that, so I opted for a backpack. This one had the right combination of light weight, attractive design and usability. I can put a lot of "stuff" in the backpack and carry it comfortably, and the inner pocket for a computer is a real plus. I've received quite a few compliments on it.

The only criticism I have is that there's no really good place to put an ID tag (for traveling). I ended up putting a D ring through the leather patch near the top and hooking the ID tag to that. I'm not downgrading my review for that because it's not a problem for everyone.

reviewText: There are some really good features: very soft leather, interesting seams, sturdy handles, not too wide bottom.  There is a center zippered divider and one other zippered compartment as well as 2 open pouches.  There are no pockets on the outside.  I love soft, slouchy purses and the color of this one is neutral, and would be good for both summer and winter.  I plan to use it as a tote and probably wouldn't even close the main zipper on the top, which is actually quite hidden.  There are no metal "feet" on the bottom for protection.  All-in-all, I am happy with my purchase.  There is an odor on opening the package (there is a dust cover) but it is dissipating.  The interior fabric is dark, shiny and is a bit stiff. I am not petite and although I can wear it as a shoulder bag, it's a bit tight and uncomfortable and will use as a tote, which I planned on doing anyway.
summary: Year round purse/tote for your use.

reviewText: love it, I've had them for a while now and they still look new

I'm 5'2, 110-115 lbs, work out a lot, 28DDD (35 inch bust), 24 inch waist, 36-37 inch hips. I got the size small and the gray fit me beautifully. The material is SO high -quality and form-fitting; very flattering to my butt. There is a line that goes down the groin which sort of creates the impression of a camel-toe, so I'm not crazy about that part, but since I mainly wear these are home, no biggie. The black on the other hand...are like 2 sizes smaller. A few other people said the same thing. It doesn't bother me THAT much, but it is why I gave this 4 stars. I can still wear the black ones, and they don't have the camel-toe problem, but they're just less comfortable, more spandexy, as though they're made of any entirely different fabric. I also think the gray is closer to my true size and thus looks prettier on me.

I got both of these for $15 so for me the price was definitely worth it. I may order another pair of gray pants because I really do love them so much. If I were to order the black ones again, though, I'd go up to a size Medium -- which is unprecedented for me. Because I'm petite and have a literally child-sized torso, smalls are often too large for me. I am pretty well-endowed in the butt department, but I still think that, if I'm wearing capable of wearing a medium, most average-sized adults are going to need at least a L or maybe even an XL...
summary: Gray is beautiful, beautiful, beautiful! Black is just alright...

Material: the leggings are cloth but they feel so soft and good. They feel really durable, even though I usually never like cotton leggings.

Price: the price is amazing for these great of leggings and you even get two in different colors

See through or not?: No it's not see through at all. It has great coverage

Cameltoe? There isn't a camel toe but the groan area is extremely highlighted on me. It has one fold on each side of my groan which draws attention to my private area and I didn't like that at all.

Why I rated 4 stars: Everything about this product is great! I love this so much but the part about it highlighting my private parts just didn't do it for me but I just feel like this was a personal problem, so if you think these will work then try them! You'll get a free refund!

reviewText:

Size 14 -16 -18.....IMPORTANT. .....Make sure to read size chart first or contact seller if unsure of what size to order. ..........Shoulders measured 20'' on the LG jacket  , 17 on the Size MEDIUM, so with my shoulders measuring 18'' wide I had to settle for the LG size one though it fit wider thru the body then I liked...Loved the color so much (Bark) though  it wasn't a deal breaker....
Great neutral color, that will work well in the spring or fall months even into the winter months I expect if some heavy layering is done underneath. Also appears very well made though sizing is a little off to the American comparative sizing used...Sellers were good enough to send  measurements after the fact (My fault for not contacting before sale) to explain the shoulder widths between the one I ordered and the size down so it saved me doing a unnecessary exchange only to get another size in that would not have fit any better..Happy enough even if it is a bit too lg. .I'll make it work..Would purchase from them again.

The amount of time I spent researching a replacement was beyond what most people would consider reasonable, mostly because Fossil no longer makes the exact model I had and loved. After much searching, I ordered the Exentri Wallet.  This is a great front pocket wallet.  I carry six cards and five or so bills in it at one time and it easily fits in the front pocket of my jeans or khakis.  It is well built.  Only time will tell if it will hold up as well as my Fossil did, but after three months or so of continuous use I am satisfied.

4. Use-wear as a costume Lollaloopsy doll it looked great. I paired it with bows,  some knee socks and a wig. My daughter won the costume contest.

reviewText: Generally wear a Misses 4 or 6.  Ordered this sweater in a Medium, and it fit perfectly.  This sweater is made from t-shirt like material; really soft and comfy.  I really like the Meaneor brand items I have purchased so far.

I really value reviews. I truly weigh out what others have to say about an item before I spend my hard earned dollars on it. I ordered an XL , which is the size I wear 95% of the time. The other 5% of the time I can wear a L. THIS XL fits like a MEDIUM. So, no, the sizing is not even close to accurate. Furthermore, I have no idea what the other reviewers meant by it being "warm" or "not too thin". It is made out of a material that is like a thicker quality t-shirt. The only similarity between this and a sweater is that they both have sleeves. So, my suggestion is, unless you want a very thin t-shirt thickness cardigan, do not order it. Also, if that IS what you're looking for. Order at least 1 size up.
summary: THIS XL fits like a MEDIUM

reviewText:
This long sleeve cotton blend cardigan is actually really nice. The material is a nice weight and not super thin. Sleeves were plenty long and are roomy enough to push them up too if I want. Has a nice ribbed band on the bottom which helps it from creeping up when bending over. Buttons down the front and all the buttons were attached very well and button/unbutton without struggle. Also has 2 small pockets on the bottom front (one on each side). I ordered an XXL which is the size I normally wear and it fit me well. Wasn't too tight nor too loose. This cardigan by Meaneor is really nice quality and is made very well all around. There were no loose threads or stitching anywhere. I would definitely recommend this.
**I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. No compensation for a positive review was provided. All of my reviews are based 100% off of my experience with the product and I never guarantee a positive review.

This is an absolutely adorable necklace! The necklace looks exactly as it does in the picture. The crystals are so cute and colorful and look great with so many different outfits. I was thinking it would be too fragile, but after wearing it for a couple hours, it feels fine. It can be cold when I first put it on, but that's normal with metals. The metal also doesn't irritate my skin in any way, which is a big plus for me. For me the price was perfect. It was fairly cheap compared to other necklaces I've bought in the past. It is of good quality and I have no doubt that it will last me for a long time. The colors are really easy to match with multiple other colors. So far I've worn this necklace with blues, yellows, whites, blacks, greens, and even purples and it still all looked great!

I also love that it came with a little bag. It helps for when I want to put up the necklace and make sure it doesn't get tangled with my other jewelry. I just slip it in the bag and have no fears!
All in all, I love this necklace! It is adorable and it goes with everything.

reviewText: Just an excellent bag for the money - you can't go wrong and it looks great.

I have really enjoyed carrying this bag. I have recently switched from carrying a bookbag to this messenger bag and I'm very happy I did.
Initially I noticed the leather looks very nice and the strap is thick enough to allow for a comfortable commute while carrying many different work necessities. My laptop fits very easily into the bag and is held securely while also providing protection.
The interior pockets allow for me to carry basically anything else I'll need for work like papers, folders, pens, etc.
I love that it is professional looking while still remaining functional. The outside zipper and flap pockets allow for storage of my phones or tablet for easy access.
I would recommend this bag to anyone who is interested in trying a messenger bag, to the more experienced messenger bag owners. The material is durable and provides high end look. I am very happy with the comfort, storage, and appearance of this bag.
I received this bag at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: The 4 pack of seamless bandeau tube top bras are very useful when trying to style your clothes appropriately! You will receive 4 in a package! My package included green, tan, pink and orange. My cup size is 38 DD and my bust fit perfectly in these tube top bands! I like that I can wear these under stylish shirts, dresses and or any normal shirt! I wear my tube top bras when I am wearing a shirt which will not look good with traditional bra straps hanging out! These tube top bras help make your outfit look amazing because your bust is concealed but no one really knows it but you! These tube top bras stretch so much! I did not have any problem of them falling down or rolling down. I think every woman should own tube top bras like these! I just recently went on vacation to Las Vegas. One of the dresses I brought was for the night out of town! It was very dressy and had very skinny halter like straps. If I was to wear a traditional bra with this dress I would have ruined my whole outfit! I danced and walked my night away! I definitely recommend these tube top bras! I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
summary: These tube top bras fit me perfectly!

reviewText:
This 4 pack of Seamless Tube Bra's are nice if you are not looking for a lot of support. If you have larger breasts, these are not going to give you great support but they will give you coverage. The material on them is soft and they are tagless which is nice. They have quite a bit of stretch to them and I would say they fit true to size. My daughter wears a 38C and these fit and covered her well. There is no padding or underwire in these.

They wash up real nice in the washer and I dried them in the dryer and there was no shrinking. The colors are nice and there was no fading either in the wash. All of the stitching on them is done well and there were no loose threads. Overall, these are a nice 4 pack of tube bra's. I received this product with a promotional discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. No compensation for a positive review was provided. All of my reviews are based 100% off of my experience with the product and I never guarantee a positive review.
summary: Nice Tube Bra's But Not Much Support!

reviewText: Perfect hat and super great customer service!
Thanks

When I saw this item online I thought it would be a great gift for my daughter who is a lifeguard and teaches swimming lessons.  She needed a hat that would protect her from the brutal Arizona sun but she wanted something stylish that would keep the kids focused on the instructor.  You never know whether an item will fit or if the description and picture would be accurate.  I debated whether to buy it since the last thing I wanted was the hassle of sending it back if it did not work.  My fears were unfounded.  The item arrived very quickly and was carefully packaged to protect the contents.  I have to admit, I didn't expect it to arrive in a box surrounded by packing.  I was anticipating it being shoved in an envelope to be trampled on by the shipping company.  Instead it was perfect and still had the form from the pictures on the item.

Items like this are mostly designed for children so I was nervous whether this would fit an adult.  I was shocked to find that it was as described and with my wife and my daughter.  The one negative of this is that now my wife wants a cute hat like this too so my testing kind of backfired as it will result in another order.

The hat was very well received and my daughter was excited to have something cute to wear during her next set of swim lessons.  Thanks for making this product available and for helping me solidify the Dad of the Year nomination.

To sum up: outstanding product that was an amazing gift for my daughter.  It arrived quickly, was carefully packaged, and it fit perfectly.  Couldn't ask for anything better.

Item says "one size fits all". Should say "one size fits most". Or maybe I have an unusually large head. I'll still wear it because it's such a cool hat, but it's not very effective at keeping the sun out of my eyes. The ladies love it though. They say it brings out my boyish charm.
Bought these after seeing them in the Vans store.  My son and father in law wore them everyday while at Disneyworld.  As a lacrosse player my son loves bucket hats the more unique the better.

reviewText: Great item! Looks good with my other metal gear.
Good quality. Very nice product . Super strong magnetic clasp. SUPER FAST SHIPPING !!!

I received this item as a free sample. The following review is my honest and unbiased opinion:

First of all, let's set one thing straight: This is not a "punk rock" bracelet. Punk is all about studs and spikes. This is a weave with skull iconography, thus making it fall into the categories of "biker bracelet" or "hard core bracelet."

Definitions aside, it's pretty sweet. Note that the bracelet itself is made of tight leather weave. The metal ornaments spin around but are held in place (pretty well) with rubber gaskets. The clasp, as I show in my pics, is around back and consists of a strong magnetic closure. So unlike those bracelets that make the rest of your biker gang wait around while you're struggling to put them on, this one closes up magnetically in a snap. It's a solid piece of ornamentation with a whole lot of macho thrown in.
summary: Magnetic Clasp Won't Make Your Biker Gang Wait As You Put It On

reviewText: Tris belt is better than expected. Well made and work really good. Very satisfied.

*UPDATE*  I no longer recommend the buckles that go with these belts. If the buckle has a comma shaped lever, it will probably break while you're wearing the belt and you will be trapped! Seriously, stick with SlideBelt. It's the best design; you simply lift the buckle cover and it releases the belt.

Having started with SlideBelt, I was looking to replace my black belt minus the buckle. The price for a leather strap was $25-30, so I looked at some recommendations and saw these EazyBelt offerings. I ordered this and a saddle brown belt, because I figured for $19 I couldn't not try these out when they include a buckle. The leather is bit shinier than I'd like, but seems very decent for the price and the buckle works quite differently than the SlideBelt. A little lever must be actuated on the bottom edge of the buckle in order to release the belt. In some cases you must push in toward the buckle with the belt ot make this work, but it's just a matter of getting used to it.

The buckle is quite handsome, and quite heavy. But, value wise, I don't think you can beat this.

reviewText: I purchased this suit 7 months ago for water aerobics and lap swimming one or two times a week. I'm 5'6", 230lbs and ordered a size up; XXXL. I should have ordered the XXL as of found this suit a bit big. It is easy to get on and off and I've experienced no chafing with it. The fabric picks easily if you come into contact with the side of the pool. It's also faded in a weird way, likely due to the highly chlorinated pool where I swim. After about 4 months, I began having issues with the modesty pads in the bra. They would easily bunch up and fold over. Now it's like someone swaddled them up and threw them in the bra. Flattening them back out each time I go to put it on takes about all the patience I have and I just bought it's replacement (speedo) for $28 at a local big box store. Overall, not bad for $20, but spend a few extra bucks and get a better suit.
summary: It is easy to get on and off and I've experienced no ...

This dress is too large by about 1" around the waist and did not come with a lace up back as the photo shows, but a zipper instead. I don't mind the zipper if the dress fit. Once I tighten the built in bra it feels better, but then there is an open space where the dress sticks off my back. The dress quality seems alright and it is comfortable, but I am dissatisfied  with the "custom made sizing" and now do not have time to have it redone and sent again from China. If you order this dress be VERY specific and allow plenty of time in case alterations must be made.
summary: Quality good, seller response time good, sizing poor

reviewText:
This skirt is a perfect addition to any wardrobe!  I am really pleased with the skirt.  It is easy to get off and on and it fits well.  I am six feet tall and often skirts come at an odd length on me, but that was not the case with this one.  It is stylish and something that can be worn for a variety of occasions.  You can wear it with tights for a more conservative look for someplace like  work or you can wear sheer hose (or none at all) for a fun night on the town.  I found that it was really comfortable and feels great on.  I usually wear a 2X but ordered the 3X and I'm glad I did.  It doesn't really run small, but I tend to like things on the roomier side.
I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion and review

I really like this skirt. It can be easily dressed up or down depending on the top and shoes you wear with it. It is true to size and feels very comfortable. The material is nice and flows beautifully. The workmanship is good and there are no loose strings to be found. I ve been receiving lots of compliments when I wore this to a party with my friends recently.
Received this product at a discount for my honest unbiased review.

This skirt fit tighter in the waist than most 3x skirts have for me, but like in the picture with the model, I pulled it above my waistline and it fit perfect up there, I just normally have my skirts at my hip area. Other than the fit when the waist line is put lower than at high waist, the rest of the skirt has a gorgeous flow, and there is no clinging to any areas and it just beautiful. My daughter said I looked like a Halloween princess! The detail in the lace is just amazing! The fabric doesn't catch easily like most lacy detailed clothing items, one little snag and you have a giant hole, I couldn't even catch a snag as I pulled and tugged on it! The pleating is phenomenal! I was running around chasing kids all day and by the end of the day when I took it off, it just looked like I hadn't even worn it yet. Great pleating and beautiful detail. You can dress it up or down and flows amazingly. I received this skirt at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Tight in the waist, but amazing in every other aspect

reviewText:
This Trendy Lace Tea Floral Pleated Midi Skirt by Poshsquare fit me better than I expected. I have had a lot of medical issues over the years which have had me not wearing any skirts or dresses in years. I wear knee high support stockings and don't want them showing because I'm self conscious with it. This skirt in the picture shown on ad, shows the skirt at about a 3/4 length. Not sure if it's due to the size I ordered (3XL) or what but I'm 5'7" tall and this skirt pretty much comes down to my ankles which honestly, is perfect for me and I love it. It covers my stockings so you cannot even see them. I wear an 18 in pants and would normally do a 2X, but I went a size up with this and glad I did.

The skirt itself I love!! The material is very nice and the pleats are small all around which makes it so pretty. I love the lace addition on the bottom of it and it has a scalloped  hem. The waist is elastic and fit me well. There is a built in slip that covers the necessary top half and that part comes mid way down my thighs. Material is sheer but the slip covers what it needs to so mainly just the bottom ends up being see through. All the stitching on the skirt is done very well and there were no loose threads.

I'm not one for hand washing things which this recommends. I personally placed mine in a delicates bag and put in the washer and then hung to dry and it came out fine. Overall, I am super happy with this skirt and cannot wait to wear it again. Finally I have a skirt I can wear and feel comfortable in.
**I received this product with a promotional discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. No compensation for a positive review was provided. All of my reviews are based 100% off of my experience with the product and I never guarantee a positive review.
summary: Love This Skirt! Nice & Long On Me!

reviewText: It ran a size smal, so I ordered up. But it still ran small in the waist and large in the  chest. I'm  5'7 tall 36D. It has odd shaped breast build-in padding, which I wouldn't have needed anyway. It made me look like I had big, wide hips.

The perfect fit and classy look for a black tie affair. Black tie tradituonally calls for a formal length gown but I chose to go short. I bought a size 8 in this dress and it fit me like a glove. My dress looked just like the picture and I did not even have to steam it out the bag. I do acknowledge what the other reviewers said about the awkward cup placement sewn inside the bodice of the dress. Since the cups are not sewn indivudually into place, but rather seem to be placed into a sewn upper pocket of the bodice, it does make it easy for them to shift which can be an issue if you're particularly busty or on the opposite end of the spectrum if you're particularly modest in the chest area. This was not my experience though.

Sizing:
The dress does seem to run small so I recommend purchasing a size up, which is why I went with the 8.

Accessories:
Also beware of your accessories! This dress is heavily designed with lace so be careful with necklaces, rings, bracelets  or handbags that could get caught in the lace and snag the dress with the slightest brush. In my opinion you do not need a necklace, it takes away from the beauty of the neckline.

Weight:
Lastly, some commented on the weight of dress. The dress does have a satin slip with like a built in petticoat which contributes to the fan out look of the skirt. I found it to be fairly comfortable and just right, not too heavy. I could still move about freely.
summary: Perfect Fit and Classy Look for Black Tie Affair

reviewText: nice coat for the buck but the material looks and feel cheap

I regret this purchase immediately, intend to return it to the seller, and even though it cost less than $40 I feel really ripped off... probably because the "original price" of $89.00 from the product page itself (took a screenshot for you) is egregiously misleading. No way someone would pay nearly $100 for this and I'm shocked Amazon is allowing this scam to be sold via Prime.

Contrary to some complaints, this fits perfectly! I'm a typical 5'9" male with all my shirts sized medium and although a bit snug in the arms, the US M (XL Label) is form fitting and accurate in size description. It's not the difference in measurement, it's the grotesquely shoddy construction and even worse, the obviously inferior material constitution. As you can tell from the pictures, it looks and feels like a Halloween costume. Obvious durability issues, THIS IS NOT COTTON or any kind of natural material in any way, shape, or form despite the product description. I feel like I could look at this thing the wrong way and it would rip in half. This jacket flat out looks cheesy.

I have experience with clothing made by similar companies and shipped on Amazon too, so it's not that I'm unfamiliar with the style. It's just truly a bad product. I've bought several coats from a brand named "Doublju" that I still love and wear two years later.

Please, dear god, just keep strolling and don't add to your cart. Save yourself the embarrassment and don't make the mistake of buying such an overpriced, poorly-made synthetic product.
summary: Pitiful construction, substandard synthetic material, false advertising... I'm returning immediately. Size is perfect though!

reviewText: Great idea. I will buy another as backup!

These glasses are great. The shade of the lens' are progressive which allows for easier reading since the reader is less tinted. This allows me to read without putting on a pair of plain readers; which is the purpose of reader sunglasses. Yet, you can't tell the lenses are progressive tinted when looking at someone wearing them.

These glasses would be great for a motorcycle. I use them for my Jeep. There is a seal around the glasses but the quality of the seal will depend on the shape of the head. My head is long and thin. They seal fine on top with a very slight gap at the bottom.

They feel like a high quality glasses with a nice storage case.

I had another pair of reader sunglasses that I really liked but these have become my favorite pair.

Everything from this seller is always spectacular.  Meticulous care is always taken to delicately wrap the items, and they are consistently shipped with measuring tape and return packaging envelopes, including clear instructions for effortless size exchanges.  The fabrics are consistently exquisite, and the size charts accurately correspond to their listed measurements.

This specific skirt is absolutely stunning, with brilliant detail that cannot be fully captured in a photograph.  Nevertheless, this style was not designed for shorter girls.  I am 120 lbs and 5'8 (size S fits perfectly), and it looks spectacular with heels.  Generally it is difficult to find skirts for my measurements, as they are generally too short.  In actuality, I could have probably gone down to an XS (though I'm usually a size 2-4), but the corset ribbons can be adjusted/tightened (and that worked perfectly).  Furthermore, Amazon charged me shipping costs at checkout for ordering multiple items from this seller at the same time, and the company immediately reimbursed me the additional shipping fees.

Even though I have used Amazon for years, I never write customer reviews (even though I personally read them before making purchases), but THIS seller has persuaded me of the importance of providing accurate feedback.  If you have been eyeing this skirt or seller for a while, then I highly recommend you make the purchase.  You will not be disappointed.  Just make sure you read the size charts carefully and measure yourself.  Cheers.

reviewText: I was looking for a not-large but enough to carry my PC bag, so I found this bag, I am using for a month and I really like this bag!! its light weight- it takes my laptop 15inch and other stuff pretty well and the different zipper-parts are very convenient. Totally recommend it!

I love this backpack! It is the perfect size for me, a 5'4" petite girl. The straps are padded so it's not as bad when you have a heavier load. The color of it all is great. I've been using it for a month now and haven't found one thing that I didn't like. Definitely glad I chose this backpack!

Gave this to my daughter as a Christmas gift, she really likes it, and the wide straps make it quite comfortable on your shoulders.

This is an update on this backpack:
My daughter has been using this item since January and the zippers have failed, They don't keep closed, they open in the middle once you zip them closed. I believe that being a backpack that gets a lot of use as the students would give it it should have sturdier or industrial zippers that can withhold the constant open/close. Very disappointing!!! It is too late to return and now I have to pay for someone to change the zippers.  I would think it over if you buy this item to go to college and put books in, and make sure you don't give it too much use. And by the way, this backpack was not stuffed for the zippers to have a problem of closing and keeping closed. I will try another brand, pity because we really liked the wide shoulder straps, maybe if the vendor decides to address this issue we would consider trying this backpack again. Looking on the brighter side, it was good while it lasted. Sorry.
summary: and the wide straps make it quite comfortable on your shoulders

reviewText: is A BIT SMALL BUT USEABLE

I am using this bag to carry my smartphone in..Just the right size. I was tired of digging in my purse for it. Now I wear this purse around my shoulder and as it is small, I also carry my regular purse too and it is just right for purpose intended. You can also carry a couple of dollars, a credit card and your license in this and skip the full purse.

I am so very relieved to have found the perfect bag for my phone and my ID.  When I go shopping I don't like to carry my big purse around thru a mall or in the stores... so I have been looking for a long time for something that is light weight, can be worn on the shoulder or across the shoulder and carry my phone, ID  and debit card.  And this is it.. totally perfect for me.

It is small and thin (which I love) and because you cant put a lot of things into it.. it is very lightweight.

Today I went to the casino for breakfast and was so happy to be able to use this..for it left my hands free but was not big and clumsy and my old shoulder purse would be bumping into things.  The strap is long so you can wear it as a shoulder bag or a crossover.  If using as a shoulder bag the bag settles  in around my hip area.... easy and convenient to reach but also out of our way.

I have a iphone 6s with a bulky otter case and it fit nicely into the bag with room to spare for cash or ID or charge/debit cards. I also tried out the Galaxy S5 Active phone and it fit in nicely also.

Pros:  Small, lightweight, shoulder bag or crossover bag, perfect size for my cell  phone and for what I wanted it for
Cons:  It might be to small for some people..

I am totally happy with this purse and though I have not had it long enough to write about durability.. for right now I give it a total thumbs up.  I always update my reviews over time if I discover I need to add something to this review, so if I discover any negatives or even more positives I will update here.

I was given the opportunity to purchase this purse at a discounted rate in exchange evaluating and using the purse and writing a review.  I take all my reviews very seriously and try to reflect pro and con in each review.  I have included some photos of my "now favorite purse" .. and I hope you found this review to be helpful to you.
summary: Small  and is exactly what I wanted...

reviewText: I don't like to carry a lot of stuff so this is good with me.  The material seems flexible so if you have to stuff more in you could.  I think it will work just fine.  I love having just what I need.  When my children were small I had to carry all kinds of stuff so now this is just fine.  It would be great for travel and a smart place to keep your phone instead of his you pocket or shirt.  I received this product at a discount for my review.

I really like this little purse, it is exactly the size I was looking for. It fits my iPhone 6 (in TPU case) well along with the other items pictured. My car keys are a bit of a squeeze but they still fit with everything. Mostly I wanted it as a pocket replacement, since so many of my clothes don't have pockets big enough for my phone and if I leave it laying around the house my toddler takes it. The interior has a suede like material to protect against scratches which is also really nice. There are 2 equal sized pockets on the inside and the clip on front works well. The whole thing looks well made, although there is a bit of a chemical odor that I expect will go away as I air it out. One other thing to note, my husbands 5.5" phone barely fit on its own in the purse so if you have a large phone like that you probably want a slightly bigger purse.
Disclaimer: I purchased this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: Great small purse for phone and a few other small items
